title: SIX T206s with Southern Leaguer / Thebo - $$$OLD
author: Cozumeleno

posts.post_title: SIX T206s with Southern Leaguer / Thebo - $$$OLD
posts.post_content:
Greetings, all -

Six T206s here for sale as I'm looking for a little extra cash and these are just sitting around.

Thebo (Southern Leaguer)
Bescher
Schaefer (Polar Bear)
Abstein
Lake No Ball/Follow Through
Schlei Batting

These are pretty low-grade condition. The Bescher, however, is in nice shape and is crease-free. It does have some very minor chipping in two small areas as well as a light print line of sorts, but is in very nice condition. The Lake is considerably better than the others with only one significant crease.

These mostly have significant creasing, but do not appear trimmed and the only ink is some faint letters on the back of the Thebo.

The Abstein is a slightly difficult common from what I've seen. I paid about $85.00 + shipping for these and will ask $OLD delivered for them just because I want to move them quickly. At this time, only selling these as a group.

Scans may not be the greatest so if you have any other condition questions, please ask.
One-time bump to $70.00 before sending to eBay.
